original_text: The Lord says, ‘When that time comes, I will make David's kingdom strong again. It has become like a broken hut, but I will repair it. I will cause it to become as good and strong as it was when king David ruled. The Lord says, ‘When that time comes, I will make David's kingdom strong again. It has become like a broken hut, but I will repair it. I will cause it to become as good and strong as it was when king David ruled.
korean_text: 그 날에 내가 다윗의 무너진 장막을 일으키고 그것들의 틈을 막으며 그 허물어진 것을 일으켜서 옛적과 같이 세우고

sentences.original_text: I will make David's kingdom strong again
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 다윗의 왕국을 다시 견고하게 하리라

sentences.original_text: It has become like a broken hut
I will cause it to become as good and strong
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그것이 좋고 강하게 되게 하리라

sentences.original_text: as it was when king David ruled
I will make David's kingdom strong again

I will cause it to become as good and strong
